Title: Monstrosity Bootstrap Shortcodes Wordpress
Description: This plugin adds Bootstrap shorcodes to a Wordpress theme that does not already have shortcodes built into the theme.
HomeWiki:
Project Description


This is a small project adding some shortcodes to a bootstrap based Wordpress theme.
Please note this for a theme that does not already have shortcodes, there could be a conflict.

For
Bootstrap version 2.32

  • row-fluid
  • span with offset
  • button
  • label
  • badge
  • hero-unit
  • header
